data.name: Conarium OST
data.detailed_description:
It's the Original Soundtrack of CONARIUM, in "1141kbps Wave" format. Featuring 22 tracks totalling one hour of eerie atmospheric music.
Songs will be downloaded to the Conarium/soundtrack folder in your Steam Directory.

Track list:

01 - Main Menu Theme (2:16)
02 - Underwater Theme (3:34)
03 - Hidden (1:50)
04 - Forlorn (3:36)
05 - Memories (0:32)
06 - Exploration Theme 1 (5:41)
07 - Darkness (0:20)
08 - Exploration Theme 2 (7:08)
09 - Blood-Stained Altars (0:51)
10 - Exploration Theme 3 (3:40)
11 - It is Coming (0:22)
12 - Antarctic Base Theme 1 (2:13)
13 - Perilous Journey (1:17)
14 - Bio-Lab Theme (3:37)
15 - Antarctic Base Theme 2 (0:39)
16 - Catacombs Theme (4:56)
17 - Tension (3:29)
18 - Rememberance (5:16)
19 - Burried Halls Theme (4:56)
20 - Tentacled Thing (0:14)
21 - Transcendence (0:14)
22 - Chaconne in Dmin by J.S. Bach (2:57)

data.short_description: It's the Original Soundtrack of CONARIUM, in "1141kbps Wave" format. Featuring 22 tracks totalling one hour of eerie atmospheric music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
